comment: I hope we value green spaces, parks and farms in appropriate locations as much as industry

BG should continue to foster a spirit of collaboration.It’s our differentiator.
I hope it can retain its southern hospitality
As bowling green grows, traffic shouldn’t become cluttered and slow.
Would like to see better road infrastructure around and inside town.As population increases, traffic increases creating delays & traffic jam
